entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is mentioned as someone who will be picking up dinner jackets with Harry. He is described as being spoken to by Harry's uncle.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story and is described as feeling lonely and missing his friends Ron and Hermione.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron is Harry's best friend who had promised to ask Harry to come and stay but didn't write to him all summer.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Hermione is Harry's other best friend who like Ron didn't write to him all summer.

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Hedwig is Harry's owl and is mentioned as being a potential means for Harry to send messages to his friends.

entities.name: harry's aunt
entities.description: Harry's aunt is mentioned as someone who is cleaning while Harry stays out of her way.

relationships.description: Harry and Dudley are going to pick up dinner jackets together. This is mentioned in the first line of the text: 'I’m off into town to pick up the dinner jackets for Dudley and me.'

Harry misses Ron and wishes he was with him. This is mentioned in the text: 'More than anything else at Hogwarts, more even than playing Quidditch, Harry missed his best friends, Ron Weasley and Hermione Granger.'

Harry misses Hermione and wishes he was with her. This is mentioned in the text: 'More than anything else at Hogwarts, more even than playing Quidditch, Harry missed his best friends, Ron Weasley and Hermione Granger.'

Harry owns Hedwig and is considering using her to send messages to his friends. This is mentioned in the text: 'Countless times, Harry had been on the point of unlocking Hedwig’s cage by magic and sending her to Ron and Hermione'
